column2: "Allow me to welcome you to the Challenge Lobby."
"In this Challenge Lobby, you can start a special Challenge Quest."
"In Challenge Quests, your goal is to reach the final area of the Quest under highly limiting conditions."
"You can begin a Challenge Quest from this counter."
"Within Challenge Blocks, your class is changed to a special class called \"Challenger\"."
"Don't worry, when you leave the Challenge Block you will be restored to your original classes."
"When you complete a Challenge Quest, you will receive rewards depending on the final result. Please feel free to try one at any time."
"If you have any questions, feel free to ask me. Thank you for your interest."
